Imperial Logic: Volume 2

Mountain Culture Beer Co.

Collaboration with Bottle Logic Brewing

Stout - Imperial / Double Pastry

Check-in Add

Unique (?) 287

Monthly (?) 2

You 0

10.5% ABV

N/A IBU

(4.26)

Add Check-in
When we released our first collaboration with Bottle Logic in 2023, we exclaimed tha Show More
When we released our first collaboration with Bottle Logic in 2023, we exclaimed that it was our thickest, creamiest and sweetest stout to date.

That was true.

Until now.

Once again, we called on Wes and Stephen and together we worked on a recipe that would raise the bar.

For Version Two, we've added a whole pallet of pistachios (hand roasted by the brewers!), fresh vanilla bean and creme brulee to a rich, dark malt stout base for a luxuriously big, warming stout.

Contains Milk. Show Less
